name: MS Saga: A New Dawn
description: Gundam True Odyssey: Ushinawareta G no Densetsu (ガンダム・トゥルー・オデッセイ　～失われしＧの伝説～) is the first role-playing game entry into the long-standing Gundam franchise. Thirty-nine different suits are at your disposal to compete against more than 300 different enemies. Customization of characters and suits gives players the ability to control each aspect of their suits, each of which features up to 60 different parts.
